update.description:
* Generate widgets for repeated:
    * nested messages
    * fields
* Update repeated fields and remove/add instances as needed
* Set/Get property values by name
* Get property count

![repeatscene.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/3546174720-repeatscene.gif)

![repeatlaser.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/764839480-repeatlaser.gif)


* There are no tests for repeated enums and repeated booleans because we don't have any messages like this on `ign-msgs`. I suppose we could create new messages just for the test, but at this point I think it's not worth the trouble.
update.title: Widgets from messages (part 5)

content.raw:
`deleteLater` seems to do it: bfe755b

(I think I was trying to do something like [this](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/72a532821519f3ad0d7a8191e4832510bc349854/gazebo/gui/viewers/ImagesView.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#ImagesView.cc-78) but newing a widget was probably not the way to do it)
content.html:
deleteLater seems to do it: bfe755b

(I think I was trying to do something like this but newing a widget was probably not the way to do it)
